### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/T7_2.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/T7_2_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: T7.2.web.alt**, version v2.0) invalid 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T7.2.IM.alt**, version v2.0) requires review 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T7.2.IM.mix**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T7.2.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.2.web.mix**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.2.web.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.2.web.map**, version v1.0) discarded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Aquastat-5.0** (Siebert et al. 2005).
 - **Aquastat-5.0** (Siebert et al. 2013).
 - **EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0** (Tuanmu et al. 2014).
 - **GLW3-lifestock-2010** (Gilbert et al. 2018).
 - **Resolve-Ecoregions-2017** (Dinerstein et al. 2017).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |url                                                                                                                                               |
|:-----------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Aquastat-5.0            |<http://www.fao.org/aquastat/en/geospatial-information/global-maps-irrigated-areas/latest-version>{target='links'}                                |
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0 |<https://earthenv.org//landcover>{target='links'}                                                                                                 |
|GLW3-lifestock-2010     |<https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataverse/glw_3>{target='links'}                                                                                   |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017 |<https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/7b7fb9d945544d41b3e7a91494c42930_0>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**T7.2.web.alt** (v2.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_2_web_alt){target="gisdata"}

**T7.2.IM.alt** (v2.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T7.2.IM.alt_v2.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**T7.2.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**T7.2.web.mix** (v1.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_2_web_mix){target="gisdata"}

**T7.2.web.orig** (v1.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_2_web_orig){target="gisdata"}

**T7.2.web.map** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T7.2.web.map_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091081){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_2_web_map){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |license_info                                                                                       |
|:-----------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0 |https://www.re3data.org/repository/r3d100013469 :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/ |
|GLW3-lifestock-2010     |https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/                                                 |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017 |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/                                                       |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Siebert, S., Döll, P., Hoogeveen, J., Faures, J.-M., Frenken, K., Feick, S.  (2005) *Development and validation of the global map of irrigation areas* **Hydrology and Earth System Sciences** 9, 535-547 
 - Tuanmu, M.-N. and W. Jetz (2014) *A global 1-km consensus land-cover product for biodiversity and ecosystem modeling* **Global Ecology and Biogeography** 23(9):1031--1045 [DOI:10.1111/geb.12182](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/geb.12182) 
 - Dinerstein E, Olson D, Joshi A, Vynne C, Burgess ND, Wikramanayake E, Hahn N, Palminteri S, Hedao P, Noss R, Hansen M, Locke H, Ellis EE, Jones B, Barber CV, Hayes R, Kormos C, Martin V, Crist E, Sechrest W, Price L, Baillie JEM, Weeden D, Suckling K, Davis C, Sizer N, Moore R, Thau D, Birch T, Potapov P, Turubanova S, Tyukavina A, de Souza N, Pintea L, Brito JC, Llewellyn Barnekow Lillesø JP, van Breugel P, Graudal L, Voge M, Al-Shammari KF, Saleem M (2017) *An Ecoregion-Based Approach to Protecting Half the Terrestrial Realm*, **BioScience** 67: 534–545. DOI:[10.1093/biosci/bix014](https://doi.org/10.1093/biosci/bix014). [Data-set available on-line](https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/) 
 - Siebert, S., Henrich, V., Frenken, K., Burke, J. (2013): **Update of the Global Map of Irrigation Areas to version 5**. Project report, 178 p. 
 - Gilbert, M., Nicolas, G., Cinardi, G. et al. *Global distribution data for cattle, buffaloes, horses, sheep, goats, pigs, chickens and ducks in 2010*. **Sci Data** 5, 180227 (2018). DOI: [10.1038/sdata.2018.227](https://doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2018.227)
